repairedDockerfile:
FROM mhart/alpine-node:6.9.1 
MAINTAINER dimkk 

# add files to container 
ADD . /app 

# specify the working directory 
WORKDIR app 

RUN npm install -g typings gulp \  
&& npm install \  
&& typings install \
&& gulp build && npm cache clean --force;

# run application 
CMD ["npm", "start"]
